string-array.name: v128
string-array.item: baek seu mul yeo deol — overlay update build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Update Gmail Overlay to 5.11.114210608.
Add readable notification text for Metal for Facebook.
Fix unreadable account text color in drawer for Chromecast App.
Add themed Google Pinyin Overlay based on Cantonese Input.
Partial fix for Youtube unreadable dialog.
AICP: Add themed Recents ClearAll Nav Button.
MM6.0/CM13: Add themed Caffeine QS Tile.
MM6.0/DU: Add expanded desktop nav bar button.
Change all blues to theme color in Twitter.
Brighten up shift key on AOSP/Google Keyboards.
Fix Boxer\'s Account Set Up Unreadable Texts (95%).
MM6.0/DU: Add BT and Notification Panel Nav Bar Buttons.
Fix failed to install due to Sony Walkmann.
Add themed ResurrectionOTA overlay.
Reshift reboot power menu icon animation.
Fix ResurrectionRemix Configurations FC in System App Remover.
Fix unreadable attachment box in Gmail.
Fix mis-merge on notification background.
MM6.0: Make Dialer block action consistent with other buttons.
Add invisible notification icon in Metal (Only notification icon).
Add themed StatusBarColor for FB Messenger 58.0.0.23.78.
Theme MediaRouter Dialog in YouTube.
Update Google Messenger to 1.7.049 (2550558-49.phone).
Fix invisible YouTube Actionbar Search Controls.
Bliss6.0: Add tintable Settings icons for cLock and System App Remover.
Fix invisible Google Messenger Resend Actionbar Button.
Change notification big picture background color to new color.
Fix unreadable Subject editor bubble in Google Messenger.
Fix Play Store button sizes.
Add themed chips downdown in AOSP Email thanks to @daveyannihilation.
DU: Update QS tiles (Themes, Fling and SmartBar).
SystemUI: Change brightness dialog background to primary background.
MM6.0: Remove buggy SystemUI notification swipe due to new notifications.

string-array.name: v126
string-array.item: baek seu mul yeo seot — staged rollout build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
MM6.0: Make the notification panel completely flat, no roundness!.
Remove Google Keep Ink Sheet BG coloring.
MM6.0/CM13: Add new Expanded Desktop Settings Icons.
MM6.0/CM13: Retheme new Status Bar Settings Icon.
Let\'s add a v23 exclusive notification style thanks to @moelle89.

string-array.name: v123
string-array.item: baek seu mul set — final build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Revert complete SoundCloud Overlay (due to heavy, unreadable objects on latest update).
Let DU Cert ActionBar take on theme color again.

string-array.name: v122
string-array.item: baek seu mul dul — hotfix build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Fix up problematic Play/Pause button in Google Photos (Video.
Revert "Remove background circle for unread count on G+ communities".
Add themed Messaging QuickMessage Popup (as of 30/1/2016).
Fix Serenity Purple not building in Arcus.
Fix up invisible accent color in Google Keep.
Fix up copypasta for Akzent colors, removing duplicate accent.

string-array.name: v121
string-array.item: baek seu mul hana — final build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Fix up some last minute Google Keep unreadable objects.

string-array.name: v120

IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Last minute theming of Trebuchet exposed values.
Remove all unnecessary permissions from Akzent.
Add 7 new colors based on Serenity by +Travis Hall (requested by +Bryan Clay).
Fix up some unreadable texts in Facebook (This fixes hide post popup which appears in the background of the app).
Revamp Google Keep Overlay to 3.3.025.0.
Fix VTS easy-build.
Theme Tapatalk\'s New Blue Fab Menu.
Make Gmail texts brighter throughout the app.
Make Gmail Drawer Text Brighter.
Fix unreadable News & Weather notification text colors.
Add themed PowerAMP overlay.
Remove background circle for unread count on G+ communities.
Change XDA Labs Accent back to Orange.
Fix unreadable text in MusixMatch Edit Lyrics Activity.
Add tinted Facebook StatusBar Color.
Update Hangouts Overlay to v7.0.
MM6.0: Add support for v23-only xxxhdpi nav bar icons to fix landscaping.
Add themed GravityBox [MM] Overlay.
Update DU Certified app overlay to 1.3.1+.
DU: Take account for DU TBO Keyboard and invert it like normal AOSP KB.
DU: Shrink Wifi SmartBar Icon by a little.
AICP/DU: Fill in unthemed nav bar icons.

string-array.name: v119

string-array.name: v118
string-array.item: baek yeol yeo deol — final/stable build
IMPORTANT: One to two minutes after updating the theme, please REBOOT YOUR PHONE TWICE!
Update GroupMe Overlay fixing unreadable events card, as well as fix excess white fade during attachment popup.
Add themed AboutBliss Overlay (my own app).
Add themed AICP OTA overlay (95%).
Add themed DU Certified app overlay (from internal closed beta).
Add themed and whitened RR Settings Icons.
Segregate all Google Drive Apps with separate API levels (this fixes Failed to Install issues on early LP based CM Theme Engine stages).

string-array.name: v116

Fix Google Photos Album Creation ActionBar Create Button.
Fix GroupMe Event Creation and Invisible Close Button.
Let\'s thicken the progress spinners by a bit, shall we?.
MM6.0: Let\'s get #DUCertified!.
Partial revert of commons alpha files for black. Use hex instead (to fix Solid Explorer).

string-array.name: v106
string-array.item: hyaku roku — final build
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!

ATTENTION! This is a monthly build now, as I started class and I have much more responsibilities now, I can\'t juggle CMTE, Layers, ROM source verification and assignments. From now on, I will only push out updates when deemed enough of an update. Please respect my decision and I would be grateful if you joined my G+ community instead of spamming my mailbox to post bugs, as other users could help answer your question/doubt.
NOTE: A bug in G+ is the paste popup due to backgroundTint, ignore it for now.
Return blue text colors to G+ (Tags, Links, Collections).
Google Now Launcher Reset - Fix White Fade BG.
Add themed Phonograph notification text and button colors.
Update MMS quick reply dialog.
Bliss: Resize "Restart SystemUI" icon to fit nav bar.
Google Now Launcher: Fix up no result found colors and drawables.
Add more colors for Google Now Launcher.
Inbox: Fix invisible unbundled message icon in drawer.
Update Google Now Launcher to Google App 5.3.19.19 (Turn off App suggestions in Launcher settings as divider is a hardcoded color).

Bliss: Add new QS Panel and QS Bar tiles.
Add themed KatePro notification text color.
Add themed Shuttle and Shuttle+ notification colors.
Fix invisible Root and SD card icon in history of ESFileExplorer.
Fix Google Play Music Tutorial Buttons.
Whiten YouTube search clear all button.
Fix YouTube text after typing in searchbox/actionbar.
Fix unreadable Frequently Contacted contact text colors.
Adjust Chrome tab text color and remove text shadows.
Re-add default text color to fix unreadable popups in Chrome.
Revert "Fix Chrome Bookmarks Invisible Text".
Add new WhatsApp Compose Icons by @arjerine.
Remove legacy Google Logo from Google Search Bar.
Hangouts Blocked People drawable - inverted the question marks.
Fix Google Play Services v8 - Popup menu black on black.
Drop support for Hangouts 3.0.
Change Hangouts overlay to use green instead of grey.
Add new Dropbox authenticator icon.
Fix BetterBatteryStats status bar color.
Fix Google Play Games Settings status bar.
Fix unreadable Google Play Games progress circle.

string-array.name: v104
string-array.item: hyaku yon
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Revert back to previous fonts to prevent switching problems.
Added Hangouts 4.0 themed overlay
DESIGN: Make launcher panels more simple.
Shorten the toast frame as requested.
Adjust framework text for foreground text in Legacy theme.
Squash, compress and optimize all images in the overlay folder.
Fix Chrome Stable/Beta/Dev bookmarks invisible text.
Update project files and fix build (rebase on 5.1.1 framework).
Fix YouTube Upload activity black on black buttons.
Update README.md for contributors to the private repository.
Change accent color in Tapatalk to allow visibility of Following buttons.
Add support for ES File Explorer 4.0 on top of 3.0.
Add themed Tapatalk v5.1.1 inverted overlay.
Add inverted Dialer hint icons for Speed Dial/Recents/Contacts.
DESIGN: Update all FABs and Circular Drawables.
DESIGN: Update all search frames to a more thin and sleek design.
Update Google Play Music Premium Activity icons, text and dialog colors.
Add missing Google icons in Play Store thanks to Kevin Dixson.
Add new Holo Dark and Holo Light framework drawables.
Update Facebook Messenger Overlay with more drawables.
Fix WhatsApp message waiting icon invisible.
Change white value in WhatsApp to fix visibility.
Add themed ES File Explorer 3.0 overlay.
Add themed OGYoutube Overlay for Settings and invisible text colors.
Fix BlackPlayerEX\'s Notification Background.
Fix Bluetooth XML comments.
Fix white on white on Google Wallet Dialogs.
Update MultiROM Manager Overlay.
Update previously untouched SystemUI navigation buttons (Bliss targeted).
Fix up Calculator status bar on ROMs with TRDS (Temasek targeted).
Fix Holo Keyboard key hint black on black.
Add Google Play Games Card color text.
Fix Google Play Games Sign Up Dialog.
Officially drop support for modded WhatsApp variants.
Update Chrome Overlay to Chrome Beta Overlay.
Update Google Keep Overlay to add missing + icon in drawer.
Update Settings icon names.
Add support for CRDroid and Team EOS Settings Icons.
Re-add Appcompat themes for styles in Gmail to combat Force Closes.
Remove Recents Clear All Icon.
Say NO! to rounded corners in Settings (Bliss targeted).

string-array.name: v103
string-array.item: Add icon recommendations into the app - Whicons!
Theme Audials and Audials Pro Notification Text
Remove Android Wear from overlays temporarily due to no physical device to test on.
Fix invisible missed call icon in Hangouts.
Theme Relay for Reddit (Free and Paid)\'s Night AMOLED mode colors.
Fix Google Play Music Premium section card background.
Clean up Facebook overlay to target less force closes.
Add TeslaUnread Overlay.
Add GroupMe Overlay - this fixes notification text as well.
Theme BlackPlayer and BlackPlayer EX notification control colors.
Fix up internal comments in Settings.
Theme WeatherBug notification background color.
Theme PlayerPro Trial and PlayerPro notification text.
Re-add themed YouTube overlay.
Theme Settings\' Dual SIM options icon.
Update CM Theme Engine Iconography.
Tweak Fastscroll handle color.
Fix unreadable Contacts text "Frequently Contacted" and unlink it from the actionbar color.
Remove DeviceDefault InputMethod style override, fixing transparent full screen keyboard.
Rebase the entire theme on a Windows 10 Pro machine.

string-array.name: v102
string-array.item: hyaku ni — STABLE/FINAL
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Change elevation value of action bar, making the design look more flat.
Fix Google Search Parking Pin Icon
Revert light grey Contacts/Dialer tile colors back to default colors, however using a fused actionbar style.

string-array.name: v101
string-array.item: hyaku ichi
Use light grey as Contact tile colors for Dialer and Contacts - to maximize readability.
Fix Dropbox Icon for Settings -> Account.
Change Contact\'s Edit Contact Accent (colorAccent to white) - while retaining FastScroll color.
FastScroll Framework Overhaul - using colorPrimary instead of colorControlActivated.
Experimental framework changes for DeviceDefault - fixing date picker dialog.
Fix Google Inbox\'s invisible icons.
Update SystemUI for internal notification changes.
Theme TextNow\'s Dark (Grey) Mode.
Fix up Sony Sketch\'s Hardcoded Accents - and fix floating action button.
Add Bliss Floating Menu Icon for Bliss Interface.
Fix Snapchat Chat Background.
Gmail: An alternative way to achieve black windowBackground - fix overflow menu as well.
Remove more traces of Dropbox Material Blue.
Fix Chromecast Backdrop Toggle Color.
Fix invisible drag handle in Google Play Music.

string-array.name: v100
string-array.item: hyaku — 百へようこそ! (Welcome to 100!)
Introducing a new numbering system (Japanese) for the distribution of new builds.
Remove traces of dm // colors in DarkMaterialApp.
Remove Icons folder from Assets folder to prevent mix up from users. Use Whicons available on Play!
Lightly theme Chromecast and Google Cloud Print apps.
Theme Settings\'s Omniswitch Icon.
Prepare No SIM status bar icons for AOSP signal cluster code upgrade.
Theme Google Play Services Help and Feedback Actionbar (Now fully grey with white accents)
Theme Dropbox Authenticator\'s Icon.
Fix App Bar Setup Settings FC using a SystemUI reroute.
Theme WhatsApp Popup Window Button Background.
Adjust Dialer/Contacts Letter Tile Colors to Theme Color (Majority wins!).
Theme WhatsApp Null Contact/Conversation Drawables (No contact picture in conversation list).
Add #NoChromo Overlay.
Squash, compress and optimize all files.
Add themed icons for Dynamic Tile QS icons.
Fix unreadable worldwide leaderboard entries in Google Play Games.
Theme Snapchat Lightly (Main screen).
Make Play Music Subscribe button less intrusive.
Add dynamic icon state-color switching for Notification Volume, thanks to Mark (@Spannaa).
Clean up indentation in Settings\' colors.
Update Pushbullet Overlay with the new UI refresh (using white as text in the actionbar now).
Add stroke to Play and Pause, and LiveDisplay QS tiles.
Sync up OTAUpdates (distributed by Matt Booth) to BlissOTA\'s overlay.

string-array.name: v99
string-array.item: ninetynine — FINAL/STABLE
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Fix Chrome Beta and Chrome Dev\'s Merge Tab Unlink Dialog.
Fix all Chrome variant\'s scroll accents.
Fix WhatsApp invisible buttons in Gallery Picker Fragment.
Revert new redesign of AOSP/Google Keyboard, but keeping custom colors for gesture swiping.
Complete re-pull from latest GitHub sources, clean up dead files, optimize, etc.

string-array.name: v98
string-array.item: ninetyeight
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Attempt to fix Contacts FC\'s using a complete rewrite in styles - cleaned and inflatable in a low, resource efficient way.
New redesign of AOSP Keyboard and Google Keyboard.
Add Exodus Settings Icon Support.

string-array.name: v97
string-array.item: ninetyseven
Attempt to fix Contacts FC\'s using a complete rewrite in styles - cleaned and inflatable in a low, resource efficient way.
New redesign of AOSP Keyboard and Google Keyboard.
Add Exodus Settings Icon Support.
Theme Exodus Updater and Power Menu.
Add custom no-SIM status bar icon and QS toggle.
Fix Google Keep Empty Entry Background Drawable.
Settings: Increasing ring volume drawable icon state change colors.
Update all icons in Settings -> Sound (Consistency in size and design).
Theme SystemUI Volume Panel "Notification" Icon.
Update Google Keep Attach Icons in Dialog.
Static Auto-rotate SystemUI QS Toggle for 5.1.1 ROMs (Due to popularity on G+).
Update BlissOTA overlay to 5.0.0.
Fix Google Play Games in-game overlay + settings background.
Fix unreadable hardkey popup menu for base app in Google Play Games.
Fix AOSP browser search bar suggestion icons.
Adjust unified status bar color and cleaning up accents in Google Play Games.
Theme AOSP Email Account Setup fragment.
Add Settings icons for OwnROM.
Remove unused fab drawable in Contacts and add contacts drawables for missing resolutions under xxhdpi.
Remove white loading symbol for WhatsApp.
Add themed Slim Device Manager for ROMs with customizable gesture support.
Darken Nova Launcher 4.0.2b1 settings lightly.
Theme Sysbar Power Menu and QuickSettings icon.
Fix unreadable Chrome hint text in address bar.
Add flashlight power menu icon.
Add Setting\'s Identicon setup icons.
Change screenshot notification\'s delete and share buttons.
Fix WhatsApp search actionbar colors for 2.12.157 - using a workaround for now.
Navigation Bar Ring Icon replacements.
Remove WhatsApp Voice Note Scrubber Colors.
Complete re-pull from latest GitHub sources, clean up dead files, optimize, etc.

string-array.name: v96

string-array.name: v95
